nodes.text: Brucce Jo'dee was a male Human who was a high-ranking member of the Death's Claw pirate gang on the planet Taris during the Cold War. He was killed by Republic forces that sought to acquire the Death's Claw's supply of rakghoul serum.
Brucce Jo'dee appears as the final enemy in the staged mission "Serum Conservation" on Taris in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare.
